title: Serious ranked team LF top laner D+
body: Out of the wreckage of paragon black this team is  slowly forming.( no name yet) We are currently looking to trial a top laner, with a good chance of the position becoming permanent.  We have  a strong roster already, and I am happy to answer any questions. Also before the inevitable  "but you are silver?!" Obviously I don't play on the team.

replies.body: D5. IGN = Slayizer looking for a team, send me an invite and I'd be happy to trial
Hey, I'm interested ! I know that I am only Silver, but I'd like to trial if you're willing to give me a shot :)
